eu.sapere.middleware.agent
Class MultithreadSapereAgent

java.lang.Object
  eu.sapere.middleware.node.notifier.Subscriber
      eu.sapere.middleware.node.lsaspace.SapereAgent
          eu.sapere.middleware.agent.MultithreadSapereAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class MultithreadSapereAgent
extends SapereAgent
implements Runnable

The implementation of a Multi-Thread Sapere Agents. On start-up an LSA that represents the service provided and an associated Thread Agent is created. When a bond event happens, a new Thread Agent is created Generates new thread agents to handle new bonds

Author:
Gabriella Castelli (UNIMORE)
